column2: My master's family consisted of two sons, Andrew and Richard; one daughter, Lucretia, and her husband, Captain Thomas Auld.
column3: My master's family consisted of two sons, Andrew and Richard; one daughter, Lucretia, and her husband, Captain Thomas Auld.

column2: The principal products raised upon it were tobacco, corn, and wheat.
column3: The principal products raised upon it were tobacco, corn, and wheat.

column2: Their names were Peter, Isaac, Rich, and Jake.
column3: Their names were peter, Isaac, Rich, and Jake.

column2: He was a very different man.
column3: He was a very different man.

column2: All the mechanical operations for all the farms were performed here.
column3: All the mechanical operations for all the farms were performed here.

column2: He was called the smartest and most trusty fellow, who had this honor conferred upon him the most frequently.
column3: He was called the smartest and most trusty fellow, who had this honor conferred upon him the most frequently.

column2: Especially would they do this, when leaving home.
column3: Especially would they do this, when leaving home.
